properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 2:30PM MST until February 16 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 4 inches. Blowing snow is also possible. Higher snow
amounts of 5 to 7 inches are expected over Whitebird Hill and
northwest of Cottonwood.

* WHERE...Orofino/Grangeville Region.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET
